org.domainobject.animation.sp.arrayobject

Class Color4

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.domainobject.animation.sp.arrayobject.ArrayObject
      • org.domainobject.animation.sp.arrayobject.Color4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _Color3, _Color4

    public class Color4
extends ArrayObject
implements _Color4
    A 4-component vertex class suitable for specifying colors.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman
